content: Singaporean actor (born 1994)This biography of a living person **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help by adding reliable sources. Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced **must be removed immediately** from the article and its talk page, especially if potentially libelous. *Find sources:* "Edwin Goh" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(September 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Edwin Goh** (born 25 July 1994) is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singaporean) actor. ## Early life Goh was a student of [Holy Innocents' High School](/wiki/Holy_Innocents%27_High_School) and [LASALLE College of the Arts](/wiki/LASALLE_College_of_the_Arts).[*citation needed*] ## Career Goh was nominated for [Favourite Male Character](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Favourite_Male_Character). He gained his first nomination for [Top 10 Most Popular Male Artistes](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Top_10_Most_Popular_Male_Artistes) & [Most Popular Regional Artiste Award](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Most_Popular_Regional_Artiste_Award) . In 2013, he was nominated for [Best Newcomer](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Newcomer). In 2015, Goh went for [National Service](/wiki/National_service_in_Singapore) for the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) after filming [The Dream Makers II](/wiki/The_Dream_Makers_II). He was nominated for [Best Supporting Actor](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actor) at [Star Awards 2016](/wiki/Star_Awards_2016). Goh made his acting debut at the age of 15 in [MediaCorp Channel 5](/wiki/Channel_5_(Singaporean_TV_channel))'s drama *[Fighting Spiders](/wiki/Fighting_Spiders)* in 2009. He shot to fame after starring as the estranged and rebellious teenage son of [Li Nanxing](/wiki/Li_Nanxing)'s character in the crime drama *[On the Fringe 2011](/wiki/On_the_Fringe_2011)*. In 2018, he completed his [National Service](/wiki/National_service_in_Singapore) for the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) and came back to act *[A Million Dollar Dream](/wiki/A_Million_Dollar_Dream)*, *Fifty & Fabulous* & *You Can Be An Angel 3* and also a toggle original series *Close Your Eyes*. In 2019, Goh acted in a long form drama *Old is Gold* and *The Good Fight*. In 2020, he acted in *[My Guardian Angels](/wiki/My_Guardian_Angels)*. In 2021, he acted in *[My Star Bride](/wiki/My_Star_Bride)* and *The Peculiar Pawnbroker* and earned a nomination for [Top 10 Most Popular Male Artistes](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Top_10_Most_Popular_Male_Artistes). In 2022, Goh played two roles in the drama *Home Again* as Ye Jiankang and Ye Kangle and in *When Duty Calls 2* as Wu Guanyan. In 2023, Goh played the role of Liu Guanghui in the drama *[Strike Gold](/wiki/Strike_Gold)*. ## Ventures In 2023, Goh and actress Rachel Wan launched the brand *Unravel &* which sells their own handcrafted crocheted collection of hats and bags. They have also conducted crocheting workshops under the brand name. ## Personal life On 7 September 2022, Goh was on his way home from a bar near Golden Mile area in the early morning when he was stopped along [Aljunied](/wiki/Aljunied) Road by the traffic police. He was later arrested for drink driving after failing a breathalyser test. He was subsequently fined $6,500 and disqualified from driving for three years. Since July 2023, Goh and his girlfriend Rachel Wan have been based in [Sydney](/wiki/Sydney), Australia, where both are on a one-year work and holiday visa. ## Filmography ### Television series YearTitleRoleNotesRef.2009*[Fighting Spiders](/wiki/Fighting_Spiders)*Soon Lee2011*[On the Fringe 2011](/wiki/On_the_Fringe_2011)*Yao Zhiyong2012*[Jump!](/wiki/Jump!_(TV_series))*Chen Xi*[Don't Stop Believin'](/wiki/Don%27t_Stop_Believin%27_(TV_series))*Cai Wensheng2013*[Gonna Make It](/wiki/Gonna_Make_It_(TV_series))*Li Feilong2014*[C.L.I.F. 3](/wiki/C.L.I.F._3)*Young Wei Lantian*[The Caregivers](/wiki/The_Caregivers)*Wei Lun2015*[The Dream Makers II](/wiki/The_Dream_Makers_II)*Eddy Xu2016*[C.L.I.F. 4](/wiki/C.L.I.F._4)*Young Wei Lantian2018*[A Million Dollar Dream](/wiki/A_Million_Dollar_Dream_(TV_series))*Zhang Yizheng*Fifty & Fabulous* (五零高手)Ye Yunfeng*Close Your Eyes* (闭上眼就看不见)Liao Zhiyuan Toggle Original Series *You Can Be An Angel 3* (你也可以是天使 3)Yuan Kai2019*Soul Connection* (爱在一百米)Delivery Man*Old Is Gold* (老友万岁)Han Xiangrong*The Intruder*Thomas*Meet The MP*Robert*The Good Fight* (致胜出击)Yan Yifeng2020*[My Guardian Angels](/wiki/My_Guardian_Angels)*Feng Kaiwei2021*[My Star Bride](/wiki/My_Star_Bride)*Zhong Shimin*The Peculiar Pawnbroker* (人心鉴定师)Teenage Cheng Huoqiang2022*Home Again* (多年后的全家福)Ye JiankangYe Kangle*When Duty Calls 2* (卫国先锋2)Wu Guangyan2023*[Strike Gold](/wiki/Strike_Gold_(TV_series))*Liu Guanghui*[All That Glitters](/wiki/All_That_Glitters_(Singaporean_TV_series))*Arthur Thng ### Film YearTitleRoleNotesRef.2010*[Love Cuts](/wiki/Love_Cuts)*Howard Chan2012*[Imperfect](/wiki/Imperfect_(2012_film))*He Jianhao2013*[Judgement Day](/wiki/Judgement_Day_(2013_film))*Liu Mingkai2019*Old Is Gold: The Bliss Keeper* (老友万岁之守护幸福)Han XiangrongTelemovie2022*[My Star Bride - Hi, Mai Phương Thảo](/wiki/My_Star_Bride_-_Hi,_Mai_Ph%C6%B0%C6%A1ng_Th%E1%BA%A3o)*Zhong ShiminTelemovie ## Discography ### Compilation albums YearEnglish titleMandarin title2012*MediaCorp Music Lunar New Year Album 12*新传媒群星金龙接财神2018*MediaCorp Music Lunar New Year Album 18*新传媒群星阿狗狗过好年2019*MediaCorp Music Lunar New Year Album 19*新传媒群星猪饱饱欢乐迎肥年2020*MediaCorp Music Lunar New Year Album 20*裕鼠鼠纳福迎春了 ## Awards and nominations YearCeremonyCategoryNominated workResultRef2011—N/a红苹果 in Ch8 Facebook Poll—N/aWon2012Elle Awards 12Breakout Star of the Year—N/aWon[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2012)[Favourite Male Character](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Favourite_Male_Character)*[On The Fringe](/wiki/On_the_Fringe_2011)* (as Yao Zhiyong)Nominated2013[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2013)[Best Newcomer](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Newcomer)*[Don't Stop Believin'](/wiki/Don%27t_Stop_Believin%27_(TV_series))* (as Cai Wensheng)Nominated2014[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_20)[Top 10 Most Popular Male Artistes](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Top_10_Most_Popular_Male_Artistes)—N/aNominated[Star Awards for Most Popular Regional Artiste](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Most_Popular_Regional_Artiste) ([Indonesia](/wiki/Indonesia))—N/aNominated2016[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2016)[Best Supporting Actor](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actor)*[The Dream Makers II](/wiki/The_Dream_Makers_II)* (as Eddy Xu)NominatedFame Awards 2016Best Actor In A Supporting RoleNominated2021[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2021)[Top 10 Most Popular Male Artistes](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Top_10_Most_Popular_Male_Artistes)—N/aNominated2023[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2023)[Top 10 Most Popular Male Artistes](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Top_10_Most_Popular_Male_Artistes)—N/aNominated - title: Edwin Goh
